Instruction: In a medium saucepan, combine the lentils, onion, and water. Cover and bring to a boil. Lower the heat and simmer for 25 minutes or until the lentils are tender. Process the lentils through a food mill or blend them in a blender.
Stir the toasted spice mixture into the blended lentils and mix well. Season with salt to taste and heat through.
Garnish the lentils with fresh cilantro before serving.
